member.name: T:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.Fist
member.summary: All fingers and thumb are flexed

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.Pointing
member.summary: The index finger is extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.MiddleFinger
member.summary: The middle finger is extended while the other three fingers are flexed. Does not take into account the thumb.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.Scissors
member.summary: Also known as the 'peace'sign. Both the index and middle finger are extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.ThumbsUp
member.summary: The thumb is extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.Gun
member.summary: Both the index finger and thumb are extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.MetalHorns
member.summary: Both the index- and little finger and thumb are extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.TechSupport
member.summary: Your hand is a phone! Both the thumb and little finger are extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.StandardGesture.DrEvil
member.summary: The little finger are extended while the other fingers are flexed.

member.summary: Utility value used for enumeration.
